title: Yasuo's reaction to his nerfs on the PBE

embed.description: This is a W ORK I N P ROGRESS POST.] [ Status: The PBE currently still down for maintenance. While the PBE is still down, working as best I can to pull changes from files!] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information!

body:
Dear {{champion:157}} 

Due to immense League of legends Community demand we, Riot Games TM, have nerfs coming your way for your bruiser build, which was frequently used in top lane. We Riot Games TM apologize for nerfing you. But don't worry we will soften the blow a bit! CertainlyT sends his regards, you
 will receive a free $1,001 debit card for your troubles.
                
                                                                       We are Sorry
                                                                      ~Riot Games

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Fw2vKtuR9yk/hqdefault.jpg
{{champion:157}} *Slams the ground in frustration*
Damn it, why!...
I have wandered for 3 years lonely... Yone... My-My respect dwindles like the falling leaves in winter... I've yet to make the truth be known... And your body was the piece I sacrificed for my innocence!...

{{champion:157}} *Drinks his favorite sake. Finds it empty after one sip.*
 Argh!... No time for hangovers!... I have something to do... Wait this letter has something on the back!

Dear Windman,

Phreak here. CertainlyT wanted to send this to you in secret. CertainlyT sends his regards. Hope you like the debit card,  I put some money in it to.

Dear {{champion:157}} 

"Hey there Yasuo hold on to yourself you've come a long way! If you're reading this then you've seen the news right about now. BUT DON'T FRET! Daddy's got ya!"

"In spite of Riot having your bruiser build nerfed I made sure they wouldn't touch your very essence! The samurai in yourself has been given a good base attackspeed increase. I know right only attack speed? But I'm sure it's all you need! After all you have done the impossible with so little."

                                                                     You're the best!
                                                                         ^-^CertainlyT 

{{champion:157}} Daddy?... ok, T... and you to,  Phreak...
*folds the letter and picks himself up. Head high up like a samurai ready for battle.*
 No more running... The plan is.... I will obtain and reveal the truth! 
*unsheathes his sword...*
 I will acquire grace! *slashes at the leafy ground*
** I will not die dishonored!** *the leaves pick up and permeate the space around him,  like confetti.*

{{champion:157}}  **Smiles, for once.**


 ☆                                    ●●●●                                    ☆


 Author's notes: So this is the first time I made stiff like this. I made it as a joke cause I had it on my mind. Please tell me if you like it! Also if there are any grammar mistakes or spelling mistakes. Also the people that I mentioned I don't know them personally. Please understand that I did this as a joke! I don't want any trouble! Anyways...

~Yasuo main out!~

wtf is this XD

Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche was a Prussian philosopher, cultural critic, poet, philologist, Latin, and Greek scholar, who coined the saying "if you cannot live with pride, you must die with it". So when he pops out of his pokeball, instead of making a grainy cry like most pokemon, he says one of his famous quotes, and as a result, voltorb becomes depressed and responds to the quote with the only thing that makes sense.

It's fuckin dark

Have another pokemon meme https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/d6/75/84/d67584d47a574c08dabca5e3fffb8142.jpg

Oh nvm found it!
S-s-s-senpai it's cold here why did you send me to the Freljord without a jacket ;-;.

{{champion:157}}  *pets her head lightly and smiles* Little Sparrow, remember when things get tough. You'd always look back on why you're doing it in the first place. That's how you'll achieve your goal...
 (Now, where did I put her jacket?.... And why did she call me senpai?...)
well atleast tanksuo is no longer freelo : D

Whoa hold up.

Someone actually suggested that ult change on the gameplay boards. 

I NOW SEE THEY DO LOOK AT THESE BOARDS, WOOOOO

**_Dear Windman_**


Finn what have you done..

Is this a hidden complaint about yasuo gaining 0.012 base attack speed? Literally only gaining 1.2 hundreths of an attack per second.

Gameplay's leaking over to maymayland. Mayday maymay!

Nope not a hidden complaint.
I like the small attack speed increase.
